generated_body: In this article, the UK bakery chain's recommendation to switch from jelly doughnuts to ring doughnuts as part of a healthy-eating initiative may reflect broader trends in the food industry towards healthier alternatives. The piece is likely to explore the rationale behind this shift, possibly discussing nutritional comparisons between the two types of doughnuts and how consumer preferences are evolving. Additionally, the article could include reactions from customers and experts regarding this change, shedding light on the challenges and opportunities faced by bakeries in promoting healthier options.
